column4: 1) sometimes it's delayed, 2) if you're testing with a gmail account, gmail is weird and won't show you that it received a message through forward if you sent it from that account
I'm testing with a Hotmail account. In the case that it's delayed, when can I test it again?
give it a few days, then email rt at ubuntu.com if it still isn't working
Ok, thanks. I'll do that in case it happens.
